resources.string: Click here to reinitialize the app
This app was concieved while watching monkeys juggling knives. It hacks your \'/system/build.prop\' WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ACCIDENTAL KNIFE CUTS! Your device your responsibility
The time between wifi scans when no stored access points are available (requires reboot)
This is the screen density allowing more high defination look (requires reboot)
Windows Manager\'s max events per second
This is a runtime value that controls the number of events the system will allow in a second (requires reboot)
This decides what the system does when you use USB with your computer (requires reboot)
The amount of time from when the system registars an incoming phonecall till the ringer starts (requires reboot)
This controls the size of the cache the Dalvik VM has access to (requires reboot)
This is strictly for appearances and serves NO other purpose

This program changes system properties in /system/build.prop DO NOT USE if you don\'t know what you are doing. We (n00bware, makers of PropModder) are not responsible for your device PERIOD. You have been warned
